document.full_text: "carnage," with a script by roman polanski and the "god of carnage" playwright yasmina reza, will star jodie foster, kate winslet, christoph waltz and john c. reilly as the brooklyn parents brought together by their children's playground fight.
document.title: sony pictures classics to distribute polanski's 'carnage'
lines_and_colors: "carnage," with a script by roman polanski and the "god of carnage" playwright yasmina reza, will star jodie foster, kate winslet, christoph waltz and john c. reilly as the brooklyn parents brought together by their children's playground fight.
